name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"fb0c0a0b-84cc-4470-8763-24a125851e95","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: pushStack","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0a5f2e4e-bfd2-4092-9d4a-887da7f2a6b5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pushStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the primary control mechanism for managing context during AST traversal. It acts as the "entry gate" for visiting code blocks (like functions, classes, modules, and loops). Its role is to transition the analyzer into a new execution context, maintain the call stack to prevent infinite recursion, update the call graph, and dynamically dispatch the correct visitor method for the current node.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4d3b126b-5440-4e85-8538-c81a3cec4b1e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis must simulate the way code actually runs. When a function is called or a class is defined, the "meaning" of the code inside depends on that specific context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f25ab9a9-2b79-463f-8088-7417f3487187","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Context Preservation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It ensures that variables defined inside a function are correctly parented to that function's namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8b46e380-c699-48ff-8cbf-7a12db1bc4ca","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Recursion Safety:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" By tracking which namespaces are already in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it prevents the analyzer from getting stuck in an infinite loop (e.g., Function A calls Function B, which calls Function A).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b0df0c65-9ec0-4d1e-a2ca-d2fdea8cd888","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dynamic Dispatch:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It maps structural definitions (like a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MAP_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for a dictionary) to the correct AST visitor logic, allowing the analyzer to process diverse Python constructs through a unified interface.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d46b1aa5-dda1-47cf-9380-3f99c8425535","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2970b76d-cba1-4fe9-8a09-d09c3bd12692","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Recursion & Cycle Check:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It retrieves the namespace (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callNs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") of the target definition. If this namespace is already in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it potentially adds an edge to the call graph and stops to prevent infinite recursion.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"419c2484-886c-4bb4-8274-a33eea82bc67","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call Graph Tracking:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It identifies the type of the definition (Function, Class, Module, etc.) and adds an edge from the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"current_ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callNs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the Call Graph (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0685f11-c078-4997-8d01-b2c47a0430c9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Visited Tracking:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visited_scope","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" set. If the scope has already been fully analyzed, it may skip re-entry to optimize performance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e3433e0b-b909-40b5-9e5a-e5b3779df0cb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Context Switching:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It adds the new namespace to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and updates the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to reflect the module and file being entered.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de9c82e8-80f5-46ae-a07c-e7305096c169","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dynamic Visitation:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"aa1a5747-c0d7-44b3-9e5e-27db6587dbbf","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It retrieves the raw AST node for the definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7837005f-528b-41a3-8f6a-acb6b26b91c2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It determines which "visit" method to call (e.g., a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"WHILE_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" might trigger ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_With","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"FunctionDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" triggers ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_FunctionDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b89a94f-48a6-4acd-97b9-3a3fc31c9352","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It uses Python's ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getattr","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on the superclass to dynamically invoke the appropriate visitor method.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"9f19d085-ab22-4f41-aaaa-edc3d8d8602e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Cleanup:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Once the visitor completes, it automatically calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"popStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to return the analyzer to the previous context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b028bba-7c25-4fb5-8331-98daf146063d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"If the analyzer is inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and encounters a call to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7445792e-82bc-481a-971e-5aec42e96d81","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"pushStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called with the definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"54dac29f-3e25-413d-96fd-78e2d96afc67","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It adds ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main -> calculate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the call graph.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"885b6742-66d2-47af-96ae-ff61f9df4e18","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It adds ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"47228144-d194-44b3-b02f-04f60f9ca10a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It identifies that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a function and calls the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_FunctionDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9839c8c4-f459-4261-840d-ab9cc6e6b13e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer moves through the code inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"816ba0b6-0f0f-4b34-9b1d-dc959834febe","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Once finished, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pushStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"popStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and the analyzer is back in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"022d892e-93de-491f-9feb-04d6d0dff339","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
